description:
Phone? Check. Snacks? Check. Keys? Check. Keep all your small necessities within easy reach with this compact top tube bag. Outfitted with a magnetic lid, the Fuel-Pack makes it quick and easy to grab what you want.

  • Burly ripstop nylon with a waterproof PU coating
  • Magnetic lid is easy to use, with or without gloves
  • Internal frame keeps it the right shape, even when all the snacks are gone
  • Internal mesh pocket helps you stay organized
  • Cable port gives you the option of connecting a powerbank to a bar-mounted device
  • Perforated straps make mounting a cinch and are carbon frame friendly
  • Mounting holes can also be used if your frame has them
  • Maximum load capacity of 1kg
name: Ortlieb Fuel-Pack
